body.p: Graves was born on February 16, 1802 in Fayette County, Kentucky. In his early year, Graves studied Law and passed the bar, becoming a Lawyer. In 1850, Graves was elected the County Judge in Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky. In 1859, He was elected Mayor of Lexington, Kentucky. Graves Died in 1874.
